item.title: Lesley add a quote by Vincent Willem van Gogh
item.description: "I dream my painting and I paint my dream." -- Vincent Willem van Gogh

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Lou Holtz
item.description: "You'll never get ahead of anyone as long as you try to get even with him." -- Lou Holtz

item.title: Lesley add a quote by George Herman Ruth
item.description: "It's hard to beat a person who never gives up." -- George Herman Ruth

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club." -- Jack London

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Morgan Matson
item.description: "Tomorrow will be better.” “But what if it’s not?” I asked. “Then you say it again tomorrow. Because it might be. You never know, right? At some point, tomorrow will be better." -- Morgan Matson

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Karen E. Quinones Miller
item.description: "When someone tells me "no," it doesn't mean I can't do it, it simply means I can't do it with them." -- Karen E. Quinones Miller

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Lenny Bruce
item.description: "There are never enough 'I love you's." -- Lenny Bruce

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "The greatest disease in the West today is not TB or leprosy; it is being unwanted, unloved, and uncared for. We can cure physical diseases with medicine, but the only cure for loneliness, despair, and hopelessness is love. There are many in the world who are dying for a piece of bread but there are many more dying for a little love. The poverty in the West is a different kind of poverty -- it is not only a poverty of loneliness but also of spirituality. There's a hunger for love, as there is a hunger for God." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lesley add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "If you're going to be crazy, you have to get paid for it or else you're going to be locked up." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Lesley add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore." -- C. JoyBell C.
